divs: Sighting DetailsThis is my status that I posted a few minutes ago on my FB wall... I never saw anything like this before! "Im freaked out! I looked over the window because the room was lightened up like was day.... I saw the sky turning brightly blue and than change red! just for 4-5 seconds, immediately after the power stopped in the whole neighborhood! did somebody else saw this??? Im trembling...it was like nothing I ever seen in my life. No lightning!!! It wasnt that..." please can you find out if others saw what I saw and what is the explanation? It is 1:14 in the morning... it happened around 1:04-1:10, here in Richmond, VA, USA.
Summary: {dr}day like red and blue light in the whole sky
